children.name: whereAmI
children.response: You are at the top of the Great Nerve-Wracking Stairs. Take a look, but watch your step.

children.name: part3
children.text: Is this still the way to Part Three?
children.response: Oh, you are already in Part Three. But yes, this will move you further. Or you may explore the lands about you. But be warned, there is not much to do in the desert.

children.name: parting
children.text: Thank you. I guess I'll head down the stairs.
children.response: Good luck. And may the Great Ones guide you.
